benchmark_details.name: WorldQA
benchmark_details.overview: WorldQA is a video understanding dataset designed to challenge models in answering questions about videos by employing multimodal data and world knowledge, emphasizing complex reasoning through long-chain processes. It includes 1007 question-answer pairs and 303 videos.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To create a benchmark in video question answering for evaluating AI in complex reasoning, particularly in video understanding.

data.source: The dataset comprises videos sourced from PVSG and user-generated content from YouTube, including the VidOR dataset and Ego4D.
data.annotation: Questions were formulated by expert annotators based on the integration of world knowledge and video understanding.

methodology.baseline_results: WorldRetriever achieved 36.38% accuracy in open-ended QA and 36.59% in multiple-choice QA.
